Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The 13th sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.The photographs show demonstrations against the war in Vietnam.The person strangled is Lyndon B. Johnson.The Mao quotation reads "If the U.S. monopoly capitalist groups persist in promoting their policy of aggression and war, they will inevitably be hanged by the people of the world one day. So will other American accomplices."
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
